simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems
Class Symbol

java.lang.Object
  simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems.ContentWord
      simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems.Symbol
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, LexicalItem
public class Symbol
extends ContentWord

This class extends the ContentWord abstract class to the special category of symbols. These include mathematical symbols like "=" and "+". The idea is to be able to store them in a simplenlg.lexicon and have them be used by a generator in much the same way as other lexical items. Symbols do not have any morphological rules that can be applied to them. They do have the special Category Category.SYMBOL, which is defined in the enum Category

Author:
agatt
